comment: The generated sigma-algebra is a subset of all sigma-algebras containing the generating set, i.e. the generated sigma-algebra is the smallest sigma-algebra containing the generating set, here ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jun-2017.)
